bibl.title: Everything is Relative. The Relative Clause Constructions of an Egyptian Scribe Writing Greek.

series.title: Papers and Monographs of the Finnish Institute at Athens.

bibl.note: Partly the same paper as 'The Language of Hermias, an Egyptian Notary from Pathyris (c. 100 B.C.)' given at the 23rd International Congress of Papyrology. - [Introduction.] - The agoranomoi of the Pathyrite Nome. - Language Attrition? - The Relative Constructions. - Concluding Remarks. - Bibliography.
VIERROS Marja, Everything is Relative. The Relative Clause Constructions of an Egyptian Scribe Writing Greek.
Leena PIETILÄ-CASTRÉN and Marjaana VESTERINEN (Edd.), Grapta Poikila I = Papers and Monographs of the Finnish Institute at Athens. 8 (Helsinki, 2003) pp. 13-23.
